name: xynga-navigation
description: Holds all of the components classified under the label of "Navigation"

scripts.link-build: npm link && cd testing && npm link xynga-navigation
scripts.setup: cd src && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd testing && npm i && cd .. && npm run link-build
scripts.start: cd testing && start chrome http://localhost:4200 && ng serve
